attributes.action: Make Richard Harris of North London a Peer of the Realm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to make Richard Harris of Hampstead, North London, a Peer of the Realm for his 40th birthday (10th May as you well know). He's an excellent chap and would be a great lord. Failing that, we think he'd be fairly happy with a birthday card and a large bottle of beer.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
